attributes.action: Debate Debt Jubilee to avoid economic collapse and subsequent depression.
attributes.additional_details: To prevent the obvious suffering and unrest a massive economic depression will bring to the UK.
attributes.background: A debt jubilee is a clearance of debt from public records across a wide sector or a nation. Such a jubilee is proposed as a solution to debt incurred or anticipated during the 2020 coronavirus recession. Further Information... https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Debt_jubilee

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.  The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for private debts - forgiveness of debts would be a matter for lenders and borrowers.
